We think that Keya set up the casino of blood.

translation.en: A quantum computer sophisticated enough to hack into anything, anywhere.

translation.en: The Heart.
So, where is she now?
The Heart predicts with 96% certainty that Keya is heading to Lisbon for the opening of Club Moritz.

translation.en: I'm not sure if we should ignore the Heart, the closest mankind has to perfect intelligence,

translation.en: because of eye contact in a bar.
This might be why you're single, Jack.

Eat tapas.

I'm tracking my asset.
You know what you signed up for.
No relationships. No friends. No poolside tête-à-tête.

translation.en: What we do is too important.

Keep it that way.
Your target is Dhawan.
Come on, Keya. Take the bait.
Smile.
Hey, Bailey.

Wheels up at eight.
Got it.
-Night, Bailey. -Night.

-[Stone] Look at that. -[Parker] No.
Voice of an angel.
♪ I want to be with you everywhere ♪ ♪ Oh, I ♪

-[Bailey] Oh, sorry. -[Parker] Whoa.

Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just, uh…
-[Yang] Carsick. -Mm.
-[Parker] It's Bailey's music. -[laughing]
Come on, swap seats with me.
-What? No, no, no. It's fine. -Come on. No, it's fine. Move.

-[Stone] Jesus! -[Bailey] Seatbelt.
[Yang] Bailey!
[Parker] Aren't you supposed to be an elite driver?
Sorry.
-[Bailey] Okay? -Yeah.

[Bailey] We head out in a couple of hours.
[Bailey] Hey, Stone.
Sent you something. Check it out.
-What is this? -It's for my niece's birthday.

translation.en: What do you think? Female perspective?
It's very pink. [chuckles softly]
[Yang] Parker, this music is ancient.

-Woo! -Oh, okay.
[Yang] Now we're talking.
Oh, come on, Bailey. You know you want to.

translation.en: Yes, I do.
[Bailey] Stone?
-Oh yeah. -[Bailey] Stone, come on.
[Bailey] You know you want to. Come on.
[Yang] Yeah.
Oh no you don't.
Watch out, you might actually enjoy yourself.

translation.en: -She's smiling. -[Yang] Oh yeah!
[man] Six hostiles entering the building…
Nine, I have you.
Six hostiles moving up the stairs. More outside.
translation.ja: 階段に６人の敵 外に多数

translation.en: They'll breach the doorway in four…
three…
two…
one.
[Bailey] Parker.
We're gonna get you out.
Stone, go now!
Nine, the window.
Get out. Now.
Stone, you will die.
Jack, I need your help.
Plotting exit routes… now.
Come on. Parker, come on. Come on!
I'm going back in.
What? No.
Saving them is not your mission.
-Get out of there. -Jack, please.
No. At best, you break cover. Most likely, you die.

translation.en: Stone?
Stone?
Stone!
-Holy shit. -Come on.
Time to go.
There'll be more. Come on.
Van's a no-go. Go, go.
Does that thing ever work?
Yeah, yeah. It works. Just not on every car.

Stone. Now would be good.
Move over. I've got this.
-Away from the guns, Stone. Away! -Just a second.

Go! Go, go, go, go!
Okay, Stone. Time to start talking.

translation.en: -Stone! -Sort of in the middle of something.

Yang.

In three, two, one.
Clip's out.

Oh, this isn't good.

Stone.
Who the hell are you?

You're not the only one with a secret.
Did they mean something to you?

translation.en: -[groans] -Talk.

translation.en: Right here,
in front of your face…
the whole time.

[Parker] Talk.
Yeah, I--
The Heart is what gives the Charter its power.

translation.en: It's the most formidable weapon you never knew existed.

Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.

you own the world.
Where is it?
Where… is it?

Hand on heart.

Stone?

translation.en: inside the building.
Stone.
[doctor] Quickly. We need to monitor her airway.

Press down.

A word in private. Now.
I told you. I knew Keya was playing us, playing the Heart.

translation.en: No, you didn't. No, you didn't You had a feeling.

-To save my team. -They weren't your team.

translation.en: The Charter exists for one reason.

translation.en: To maximize lives saved. That's the only moral metric there is.

translation.en: Made for us by a machine.
Have you forgotten how radical that is?

translation.en: It doesn't mean that what we do is easy or feels nice.

translation.en: No.

So, what do we do now?
[groans] I'm…

It's nothing personal.
No.
I'm starting to see that.
[man] Hello?

translation.en: Doesn't feel like they're taking care of their most valuable player.

translation.en: What do you want?
[Keya] Don't be a sore loser.

translation.en: What?
[Stone] You didn't know, huh?
Well, I told you this wasn't a game, Keya.

translation.en: -Morning, ma'am. -Morning.
[man] Nomad. Great spot.
translation.ja: ノマド いい場所だ

translation.en: All four kings in the same room. How long has it been, three years?
translation.ja: ４人のＫがそろうのは ３年ぶりか

translation.en: Not long enough.
So, who is this Parker, and how did we miss him?

translation.en: Career intelligence agent. Born in Belfast, lives alone.
translation.ja: ずっと諜報員で１人暮らし

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.
translation.ja: 愛する人はおらず 国に尽くしていたものの 消耗品として扱われた

translation.en: He has devoted his life to a country that sees him as expendable.
translation.ja: 国に尽くしていたものの 消耗品として扱われた

translation.en: Okay. We get it. All that is fuel for the fire.

translation.en: I had to lean extremely hard on some very old friends for this.

translation.en: Chechnya, December 2015.
What's this?
It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.
translation.ja: 君が来る前 ハートもない時代だ

translation.en: A Chechen warlord was given free rein by the Chechen and Russian governments.

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.
translation.ja: 西側は知らん顔していた

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.
translation.ja: 彼は反対派を 村ごと粛清してた

translation.en: But… what's this got to do with Parker?
He was there.
Different identity. No electronic records.
translation.ja: 別の名で電子記録はないけど

translation.en: But he was there, with MI6, delivering weapons to take the warlord out.
translation.ja: ＭＩ６のチームと共に 司令官を倒す武器を運んでた

translation.en: [man] Any sign of them?
You got an ETA yet?
They'll be here.
[woman] We intercepted a communication. It was a trap.
translation.ja: 我々は通信を傍受して ワナだと知った

translation.ja: ＭＩ６の情報で チームは全員 処刑されたと分かった

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
translation.ja: チームは全員 処刑されたと分かった

translation.en: The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.ja: 内戦の危機に瀕(ひん)した地域だ

translation.ja: 報告も調査もなく 関係者の記録も抹消された

translation.en: We thought everyone had died.

What a mess.

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.

translation.en: You killed Bailey and Yang? That wasn't the plan.
translation.ja: ヤンたちを 殺す計画じゃなかった

translation.en: You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.ja: 技術に専念して 戦略は任せろ

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.ja: パートナーだよね 仕事してほしいなら 事前に言ってよ

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.ja: 仕事してほしいなら 事前に言ってよ

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.ja: チャーターは ヤンたちなど気にもかけない

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.ja: 目的を果たしたいなら 君もそうしろ

translation.en: [Stone] Hey, Barry. I'm a friend of your dad's.
translation.ja: バリー ベイリーの友達だよ

translation.en: It's okay.
[whispers] I've got you.
The camera.
She hacked into the camera feed. Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.ja: 映像をハックしたなら 痕跡が残ってるかも

translation.en: There she is.
What's in the desert, Keya? I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
translation.ja: 砂漠に何がある？ 夜遊びじゃなさそう

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
West Africa. The Locker.
translation.ja: 西アフリカ ロッカーだ

translation.en: [Parker] You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.ja: ヘリで４万フィート 上昇した経験は？

translation.en: Trick question. No one has.
translation.ja: 引っかけ問題か　人類未踏だ

translation.en: But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.ja: でもママは “何でもできる”と

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends?
Eleven hours and seven minutes.
At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
translation.ja: ロッカーが４万フィートまで 降下するのに９分26秒

translation.en: We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart, and get out again before they regain control.
translation.ja: 侵入 ハートの奪取 脱出までの制限時間は８分よ

translation.en: Very precise.
You're sure?
No. I'll be sure when it descends.
If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.ja: 私のコードがバレてたら 破滅よ

translation.en: -Hey. -Good morning.
What time is it?
Uh, it's nearly seven.
What? Oh shit.
[Ivo] Any luck?
Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
translation.ja: いずれ尻尾をつかむさ

translation.en: -I'll see if they-- -[alarm blaring]
Oh no, no, no, no, no.
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
translation.ja: 乗せていくだけでいい

translation.en: Nomad will string me up for this.
Tell her I stole your keys.
You'll just have to trust me.
[Keya] Okay. Moment of truth.
translation.ja: いよいよ真実の瞬間よ

translation.en: How will we know if it's worked?
Would you look at that?
The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes. Still descending.
translation.ja: ロッカーは２分で １万5000フィートも降下

translation.en: Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
translation.ja: セキュリティーは停止 閉め出された

translation.en: -How is that even possible? Another hack? -No. No.
translation.ja: なぜ？　またハック？ 敵が前に仕込んだコードが 動き出したんだ

translation.en: This is why they did it the first time. It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
translation.ja: 敵が前に仕込んだコードが 動き出したんだ

translation.en: -Can you override it? -I'm trying.
[Ivo] The air lock's been breached.
Contact every Charter agent in the region.
There's no one within 500 miles.
[pilot] Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
-I hope you know what you're doing. -[Stone] Tell me about it.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だね 任せて

translation.en: -We have a something approaching fast. -[Nomad] A something?
translation.ja: 何かが高速で接近中 何か？

translation.en: -[Jack] Thirty seconds out. -What is it?
I think-- I think it's a someone.
Who is it?
Go in closer.
Is that--?
It's Stone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
translation.ja: 高度を下げないとまずい

translation.en: [Parker] Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
[Nomad] She's not gonna make it.
Look who it is.
-I'm gonna need a minute. -No!
The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.ja: ダメ！　火花１つで爆発する

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
Come on, Rachel. Come on.
translation.ja: レイチェル 何とかして

translation.en: It's over, Keya.
For who?
I told you not to get out of the van.
You also told me to have some fun.
It's gone.
And now you answer to me.
We've lost the Heart.
Not yet.
Parker. Ninety seconds. Let's go.
translation.ja: パーカー あと90秒よ

translation.en: [Parker] Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
translation.ja: パラシュートが破れて 残念だな

translation.en: -[Stone grunts] -[Keya] Get off me!
No, no, no, no, no! [screams]
-Get after them. -Impossible.
translation.ja: 追え 無理だ　着陸が精いっぱいだ

translation.en: -We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -[grunts]
translation.ja: 無理だ　着陸が精いっぱいだ

translation.en: Get away!
Leave me alone!
Morning, sunshine.
Give me that thing before somebody gets--
I don't think so.
So, here's what's gonna happen.
You're gonna secret-agent our way back to civilization,
and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.ja: 私は後ろからついていく

translation.en: -Where's the Heart? -Parker has it.
translation.ja: ハートは？ 彼が持ってるけど 生体認証で暗号化した

translation.en: But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.ja: 彼が持ってるけど 生体認証で暗号化した

translation.en: Come on, get up.
If I shoot you now, all this is over.
Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.ja: ヤンたちへの同情に 免じて許す

translation.en: It's the logical play, Rachel.
It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
I'm not like you.
On your feet.
We need to keep moving.
So, what's the plan, Keya?
Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.ja: ニーアム･カーチェに 追い出された復讐(ふくしゅう)？

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
translation.ja: 全部 知ってるつもり？

translation.en: I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me, lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.ja: 彼が私を養子にした理由は ハートで分かった？

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.ja: あいつは私の両親を 薬の実験で殺した

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.ja: それを隠して私を養子にし 救った気になってた

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.ja: それを隠して私を養子にし 救った気になってた でも 私はいつか強くなり 敵(かたき)を討つつもりでいた

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.ja: でも 私はいつか強くなり 敵(かたき)を討つつもりでいた

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down?
Oh, this is not just for me. It's for people like me.
translation.ja: 私みたいな人のためだよ

translation.en: Parker's gonna destroy the Charter. I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.ja: パーカーはチャーターを壊し 私は悪党どもをさらす

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
You're a child.
And you think the Charter's any better?
Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.ja: 救ってくれても 善とは限らない

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
How many schools did you get kicked out of? Seven? Eight?
translation.ja: 退学になった学校の数は ７校？　８校？

translation.en: Always a rebel. Always a problem.
Violent, alone, helpless.
translation.ja: 暴力 孤独 無力

translation.en: -Stop. -Until the Charter comes along, right?
translation.ja: やめて チャーターが来て 規律を与えるまでね

translation.en: And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.ja: チャーターが来て 規律を与えるまでね

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
translation.ja: 救われたのは あなたが壊れてたから？

translation.en: -Or because you were broken? -Enough.
translation.ja: 救われたのは あなたが壊れてたから？ もういい

translation.en: Maybe I was broken.
But there's a woman I know only as Nomad. She rescued me, trained me,
translation.ja: でもノマドという女性が 私を救って訓練して

translation.en: showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.ja: 援護があれば 何ができるか教えてくれた

translation.en: Where is she now?
Let's go.
Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.ja: パーカーが来る前に 大きな銃が欲しい

translation.en: They're headed for us.
Maybe it's Parker.
It's definitely not the Charter.
[Stone] Mercenaries?
Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story. They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.ja: 身代金を取れると思わせて 油断させてぶちかませ

translation.en: Just to be clear, the "bam" is for you to take them out.
translation.ja: あなたが殺すって意味

translation.en: Yeah, I get that.
[in English] You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
translation.ja: チャーターも カーチェを倒せる

translation.en: Parker's way isn't the only way.
[in English] Come with me.
She got away. That wasn't the deal.
translation.ja: 逃げられた　約束が違う

translation.en: Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.ja: 殺すとは聞いてない 早く払って

translation.en: The deal changed.
You're a hard woman to find.
Six of Hearts.
Nomad sends her best.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.ja: ダワンは戻った 仕込んだ発信機によると 北上中

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.ja: 仕込んだ発信機によると 北上中 情報を送る

translation.en: [Nomad] Hi, Rachel. Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
translation.ja: レイチェル よかった　心配してた

translation.en: Were you?
Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
I take it I'm no longer compromised.
translation.ja: もう私は危険じゃない？

translation.en: Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.ja: 私たちは隠れ家へ移動中

translation.en: Clubs is assembling a team. We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.ja: クラブがチームを作って あなたに合流する

translation.en: And if we're too late?
Just get there as fast as you can.
If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.ja: ハートがネットにつながれば 大惨事よ

translation.en: I'm on my way.
It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
translation.ja: 鉄壁じゃないけど ここしかない

translation.en: If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
[Stone] Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland?
translation.ja: アイスランドへ行ける？

translation.en: Hell yeah.
Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday.
Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
translation.ja: しなくても助けに来た？

translation.en: We're a team, Keya.
Don't do it again.
I think I have it.
I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.ja: 目的地は レイキャビク大学のラボだ

translation.en: It has a cryo-storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.ja: 冷凍機と 大量のサーバーがある

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
translation.ja: ケヤ 俺は約束を守るぞ

translation.en: Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.ja: 準備しろ　指示は分かるな

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
Are we up?
We're up.
Is this your naughty list?
Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.ja: ハートが メールや口座を調べてる

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
Greatest skeleton key in the world.
translation.ja: 最強のマスターキーね

translation.en: Show me.
[Keya] There it is.
Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.ja: カーチェが 大勢に実験した証拠よ

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.ja: 世界中にさらしてやる

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
Find me the Kings.
What are you doing?
[woman] Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex-CIA.
translation.ja: ナンシー･モリソン ダイヤのＫで元ＣＩＡ

translation.en: The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.ja: 家族と隠れ家へ移動中

translation.en: Drop the lift.
Are you serious?
No. Do--
You're welcome.
[man] Hang on. I have another one.
I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.ja: 33分前 正体不明の軍用機が着陸した

translation.en: There.
Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.ja: チャン･スー 中国の保安局で35年勤務

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
Even better. Where is he now?
Two minutes out.
Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.ja: 計画を送る　ストーンも来る

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
translation.ja: 時間がない　先に行く

translation.en: Any news of Spades or Hearts?
[man] Nothing yet.
There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
translation.ja: エレベーターには 他の人もいた

translation.en: Calm down, Keya.
You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.ja: カーチェとチャーターを 殺すとは聞いてない

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.ja: ハートのＫとチームは ロンドン郊外の地下壕

translation.en: Good.
Take them out.
[Clubs] We're approaching now.
translation.ja: もう着く　また後でな

translation.en: -We'll see you on the other side. -You're going in with them?
translation.ja: もう着く　また後でな あなたも？

translation.en: I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.ja: ドローン攻撃を命じたしな

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.ja: 私もきっと同じ判断をした

translation.en: Thanks. The right--
I've lost contact.
The Heart's online.
No, no, no, no.
We're locked in.
[Jack] Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
translation.ja: 換気システムが遮断された

translation.en: No, no, no, no.
Jack, how long we got?
translation.ja: 何分持つ？ 〝酸素〞 何分持つ？

translation.en: At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.ja: チャーター同様 邪魔者を気にするな

translation.en: [woman] King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
-You have to stop this, please. -Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.ja: 止めてよ 絶大な権力を共に操ろう

translation.en: -Why not us? -This is not what we agreed.
translation.ja: 絶大な権力を共に操ろう 話が違う

translation.en: You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had with the bad man who killed your mom and dad. This is about power.
translation.ja: 親を殺された怒りなんかより 権力の問題だ

translation.en: Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.ja: ひと握りの人間が権力を持ち 世界をよくできるのに そうしてない

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.ja: 世界をよくできるのに そうしてない

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.ja: 今 何兆ものデータを 収集中だ

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.ja: 数時間後には 残りのメンバーも抹殺できる

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives. Now it's time for us to take control.
translation.ja: ずっと操られてきたが 今度は俺たちの番だ

translation.en: [Clubs] Go.
[man] Clubs team are inside the university building.
translation.ja: クラブのチームが建物に侵入

translation.en: What… are you doing?
You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.ja: 偉人は権力をどう得ると？

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
or because they deserve it.
translation.ja: 与えられるのでもない

translation.en: It is because when the moment comes,
they take it.
Stone is one minute out.
In position. We're all set.
translation.ja: 全員 準備できてる

translation.en: [woman] She's approaching the university.
Stone, you need to get out now. I don't have long.
translation.ja: すぐ逃げて　長く話せない

translation.en: Keya?
I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart. They won't be able to access it without me.
translation.ja: 私抜きでは ハートを使えなくした

translation.en: I'm outside. But you already know that.
No, you're not. It's a trap.
I found your tracker. The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.ja: 発信器を見つけたの ラボはおとりよ

translation.en: -Why should I believe you? -Because you were right.
translation.ja: 信じろと？ 何もかも あなたの言うとおりだった

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.ja: 何もかも あなたの言うとおりだった

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.ja: 両親もこんなの 望まない

translation.en: Just please listen to me. Get your team out of there right now.
translation.ja: お願いだから チームを脱出させて

translation.en: -Tell me where you are. -[Keya] Okay.
translation.ja: 現在地を教えて 今 座標を送る 裏口は開けておく

translation.en: I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.ja: 今 座標を送る 裏口は開けておく

translation.en: Shit.
[grunts] I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
translation.ja: ハートの９よ　無線を

translation.en: [groans] Go.
This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.ja: こちらハートの９ 逃げて　ワナよ

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
translation.ja: 発信機はバレた　脱出して

translation.en: Do you hear me?
Yeah… I hear you.
What's going on?
-Where is she? -[woman hesitates]
-[woman mumbles] -What has she done? -How long to fix it? -Oh.
translation.ja: 何事だ？　いつ直せる？

translation.en: I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
You have until I get back.
[Jack] The door won't move.
[grunts] Damn it!
[Ivo] There must be an emergency override system. We must have missed something.
translation.ja: 緊急用のシステムが あるはずだ

translation.en: Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
No. No comms. We're still offline.
translation.ja: 無理　オフラインだ

translation.en: Maybe-- Maybe try the landline.
[groans] Okay. Okay.
-[Nomad] Stone, thank God. Where are you? -Clubs are dead.
translation.ja: よかった　今どこ？ チームは全滅

translation.en: University was a trap.
I have new intel. A new location.
translation.ja: 新しい場所の情報がある

translation.en: We've-- We've lost Clubs?
What new intel?
[Stone] Keya. She shut down the Heart.
translation.ja: ケヤがハートを止めた

translation.en: -How do you know she's not playing you? -I don't.
[Nomad] We're gonna die in less than an hour.
translation.ja: 私たちは換気を止められて １時間持たない

translation.en: -They shut down our air supply. -What?
translation.ja: 私たちは換気を止められて １時間持たない え？

translation.en: -She shut down our air supply. -[Stone] Parker did.
translation.ja: ケヤの仕業よ パーカーよ

translation.en: I believe her, Nomad.
I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her.
I trust her, and you need to trust me.
Fifty minutes.
I can work with that.
I'll see you.
You too.
Sorry, I need your truck.
[Parker] I know you're in here, Keya.
You know, you still have a choice.
You can still be a part of this.
You're only delaying the inevitable.
translation.ja: 逃げても結果は同じさ

translation.en: -Would you like me to wait? -[Stone] Definitely no.
translation.ja: 待とうか？ まさか でもありがとう

translation.en: But thanks!
translation.ja: まさか でもありがとう

translation.en: Come on, Keya.
[Nomad] Settle down now. Conserve air.
translation.ja: もういい 空気を節約しよう

translation.en: -Move. -[panting]
Get the Heart back online.
Do it!
Get up.
Get up!
[Parker] Right. Where do we start?
Fingers?
No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
-[Keya screams] -Yeah. Last chance.
[inhales] Okay, I'll do it.
Go on.
I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.ja: ハートを サーバーに再接続する

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.ja: 干渉があると 自動停止するでしょ

translation.en: [Parker] Move.
This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.ja: 君の負けだ 近づけばこいつを殺す

translation.en: -I don't care. I'm here for you. -[Parker] Bullshit.
translation.ja: どうぞ あんたを殺す ウソつけ

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies, unless, of course, they're dead already.
translation.ja: ハートは動かず仲間は死ぬと 知ってるだろ

translation.en: I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.ja: ハートもＫもある俺の勝ちだ

translation.en: Okay. I'll put it down.
Good girl. Now, kick it away.
Tell me this, though.
What's your point, hm?
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered. The world is still in chaos.
translation.ja: ずっと尽くしてきたのに 世界は混乱したままだ

translation.en: The Heart has the power to change everything. But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.ja: ハートで変えられるのに チャーターは何も変えてない

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.ja: 権力が欲しいだけでしょ

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
translation.ja: 最初にしたのは殺人だった

translation.en: [scoffs] The problem with men like you, Parker, is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
translation.ja: あんたみたいな男の問題は 脅しと暴力しか知らないこと

translation.en: And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.ja: チームさえ 残忍に扱うあんたは

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.ja: 私の持つ宝を手にできない

translation.en: Yeah? And what is that, Rachel?
translation.ja: へえ そいつは何だ？

translation.en: Someone to watch my back.
Maybe in the next life. [chuckles]
See you when I get there. [exhales]
[Stone] Nomad, tell me you're okay.
translation.ja: ノマド 無事だと言って

translation.en: Is everyone still with us?
[groans] Yeah, yeah.
It's good to hear from you, Stone.
I knew I would.
Hey, Barry.
What's this?
I don't know.
It's beautiful.
[girl] But what is it? Who's it from?
[Stone] Looking good.
I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
translation.ja: 月並みだけど 服役中は体を鍛える

translation.en: You've had worse goals.
So my lawyers tell me.
And you? Back with the Charter?
[inhales] Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.
But on two conditions.
The Heart's an amazing tool. But that's all it is.
translation.ja: ハートは驚異的だけど 機械でしかない

translation.en: If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.ja: 確率に従うだけなら 形勢逆転できない

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
translation.ja: 機械が 何もするなと言ったら？

translation.en: That's when they send me.
What's the second thing?
I liked my team, Keya. I miss them.
translation.ja: チームの仲間が今も恋しい

translation.en: I wanna surround myself with people who will change the world for good.
translation.ja: 世界をよくしたい人に 囲まれてたい

translation.en: How we doing, Jack?
[Jack] Good news and bad news. The good news, I've scouted the square, and your plan just might work.
translation.ja: いい知らせと悪い知らせ まず計画は成功しそう

translation.en: The bad news--
[exhales] Uh, they were out of oat milk.
-[car door closes] -Jack.
What? You told me to blend in.
Did we get into the power grid?
Yeah. It wasn't that hard, because their password was "password."
translation.ja: パスワードが“password”で 楽勝だった

translation.en: Your coffee.
Thank you.
This is cold.
Um, you know we can still throw you in jail, right?
[Stone] Hey.
Stay in the van.
We stay in the van, boss.
-The Heart's all set. -[Stone] And the diversion?
translation.ja: ハートは準備よし もう１つは？

translation.en: Ready.
[exhales] Go give them the bam.
Always.
